using System;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using HotChocolate;
using HotChocolate.Types;
using HotChocolate.Execution.Configuration;

namespace Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection
{
    public static partial class TestsTypesRequestExecutorBuilderExtensions
    {
        public static IRequestExecutorBuilder AddTestsTypes(this IRequestExecutorBuilder builder)
        {
            builder.ConfigureDescriptorContext(ctx => ctx.TypeConfiguration.TryAdd(
                "Tests::TestNamespace.Query",
                global::HotChocolate.Types.OperationTypeNames.Query,
                () => global::TestNamespace.Query.Initialize));
            builder.ConfigureSchema(
                b => b.TryAddRootType(
                    () => new global::HotChocolate.Types.ObjectType(
                        d => d.Name(global::HotChocolate.Types.OperationTypeNames.Query)),
                    HotChocolate.Language.OperationType.Query));
            return builder;
        }
    }
}

        internal static void Initialize(global::HotChocolate.Types.IObjectTypeDescriptor descriptor)

                    var bindingResolver = field.Context.ParameterBindingResolver;

                        };

                    parameterInfo = bindingInfo.GetBindingInfo(parameter);

        static partial void Configure(global::HotChocolate.Types.IObjectTypeDescriptor descriptor);

        private sealed class __Resolvers
        {
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_ExecuteQuery_query;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_ExecuteQuery_timeout;

            public __Resolvers(global::HotChocolate.Resolvers.ParameterBindingResolver bindingResolver)
            {
                _binding_ExecuteQuery_query = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_ExecuteQuery_query());
                _binding_ExecuteQuery_timeout = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_ExecuteQuery_timeout());
            }

            public global::HotChocolate.Internal.ParameterDescriptor CreateParameterDescriptor_ExecuteQuery_query()
                => new HotChocolate.Internal.ParameterDescriptor(
                    "query",
                    typeof(string),
                    isNullable: false,
                    []);
            public global::HotChocolate.Internal.ParameterDescriptor CreateParameterDescriptor_ExecuteQuery_timeout()
                => new HotChocolate.Internal.ParameterDescriptor(
                    "timeout",
                    typeof(int),
                    isNullable: false,
                    []);

            public HotChocolate.Resolvers.FieldResolverDelegates ExecuteQuery()
            {
                var isPureResolver = _binding_ExecuteQuery_query.IsPure && _binding_ExecuteQuery_timeout.IsPure;

                return isPureResolver
                    ? new global::HotChocolate.Resolvers.FieldResolverDelegates(pureResolver: ExecuteQuery)
                    : new global::HotChocolate.Resolvers.FieldResolverDelegates(resolver: c => new(ExecuteQuery(c)));
            }

            private global::System.Object? ExecuteQuery(global::HotChocolate.Resolvers.IResolverContext context)
            {
                var args0 = _binding_ExecuteQuery_query.Execute<string>(context);
                var args1 = _binding_ExecuteQuery_timeout.Execute<int>(context);
                var result = global::TestNamespace.Query.ExecuteQuery(args0, args1);
                return result;
            }
        }
